doc.title: New Version of Ieat Hawker App Released!
doc.text: We/PRP have/VBN just/RB released/RB an/DT updated/NN version/NN of/IN the/DT ieat/JJ Hawker/NN App/NN which/WDT will/VB work/NN with/IN IOS/JJ 4.3/NN onwards/NNS ./. The/DT App/NN will/MD include/VB some/DT new/JJ stall/NN listings/NN as/IN well/RB as/IN drop/JJ down/NN instructions/NNS on/IN how/WRB to/TO make/VB the/DT most/NN of/IN all/DT the/DT functions/NNS ./. If/IN you/PRP have/VBP already/RB downloaded/VB the/DT App/NN ,/, all/DT you/PRP need/VB to/TO do/VB is/VBZ to/TO do/VB an/DT update/NN ./. If/IN you/PRP have/VBP n't/RB downloaded/VB Ieat/NN Hawker/NN yet/RB ,/, just/RB search/VB for/IN ``/NNP Ieat/NNP Hawker/NNP ''/NNP in/IN App/NNP Store/NNP or/CC visit/VB this/DT link/NN ./. We/PRP are/VBP still/RB working/VBG on/IN another/DT button/NN where/WRB you/PRP can/MD list/NN stalls/NN according/NN to/TO location/NN ./. For/IN example/NN ,/, click/NN on/IN Ang/NNP Mo/NNP Kio/NNP ,/, and/CC all/RB the/DT recommended/NN stalls/NNS in/IN Ang/NNP Mo/NNP Kio/NNP will/MD be/VB listed/VBD ./. Right/PRP now/RB ,/, you/PRP can/MD do/VB that/RB by/IN going/NN to/IN the/DT map/NN and/CC press/NN and/CC hold/NN on/IN the/DT Ang/JJ Mo/NN Kio/NN region/NN ./. Please/JJ continue/NN to/TO support/VB us/PRP by/IN telling/VBG your/PRP$ friends/NNS about/IN the/DT App/NN ./. With/IN your/PRP$ support/NN ,/, we/PRP can/MD continue/VB to/TO keep/VB improving/VBG it/PRP !/.
